CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Cargo Planes relative to Freight Trains?
SRP.A: Cargo Planes is {above} Freight Trains in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fuel consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Delivery Vans}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fuel consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Long-Haul Trucks}.

VE.Q: What is Long-Haul Trucks's Fuel Consumption in 1996?
VE.A: Long-Haul Trucks's fuel consumption in 1996 is {6.68} L/100km.

VE.Q: What is Freight Trains's Fuel Consumption in 1990?
VE.A: Freight Trains's fuel consumption in 1990 is {9.22} L/100km.

VE.Q: What is Cargo Ships's Fuel Consumption in 1995?
VE.A: Cargo Ships's fuel consumption in 1995 is {7.08} L/100km.

VE.Q: What are the fuel consumption of Long-Haul Trucks, Delivery Vans, and Cargo Ships in 1991?
VE.A: Long-Haul Trucks's fuel consumption is {7.99} L/100km, Delivery Vans's fuel consumption is {8.57} L/100km, Cargo Ships's fuel consumption is {7.89} L/100km.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Fuel Consumption in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum fuel consumption is {5.69} L/100km.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Fuel Consumption in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum fuel consumption is {17.01} L/100km.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Fuel Consumption level recorded for Cargo Planes?
EVJ.A: Cargo Planes reached approximately {14.13} L/100km in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Fuel Consumption level recorded for Cargo Planes?
EVJ.A: Cargo Planes's lowest recorded level is approximately {6.23} L/100km in {1990}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Fuel Consumption?
SC.A: The average total fuel consumption is {47.68} L/100km.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Fuel Consumption exceed 47.98 L/100km? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Fuel Consumption fall between 44.26 and 48.92 L/100km? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Fuel Consumption go below 45.21 L/100km? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1994, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 1991 and 1994 was {larger} than between 1995 and 1996.

NC.Q: Was the total Fuel Consumption in 1994 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total fuel consumption in 1994 was {lower} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1994, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 1997?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 1990 and 1994 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1993, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 1991 and 1993 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 1996.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Delivery Vans} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Long-Haul Trucks, Cargo Ships, Freight Trains, Cargo Planes, Delivery Vans}.
